title: I did a persuasive speech on "Kill yourself", I used the hot topic on boards as part of the visuals

replies.body:
I was in a game with a 4 man premade once that told me to go kill myself. So I took their advice and proceeded to feed to high hell and when my gold value dropped I would pick up a kill or assist and restart the process. 

Morale of the story? Be careful what you wish for.

> [{quoted}](name=YOU BEEN WARNED,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=2aAZzMop,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-11T20:02:42.843+0000)
>
> Moral*
> 
> Good story though.  :P

My bad lol was on my cell phone at work when I replied.
Post it so we can laugh at you just like your professor did.
